title: SS grows up
author: VD
content_html:
It would appear that the SF/F genre is gradually becoming more aware of the existence of Stupefying Stories and the writers it publishes: “Return to Earth,” by Ryan M. Jones, first published in STUPEFYING STORIES 1.1 (October 2011), is this week’s Main Fiction feature on StarShipSofa, the Hugo Award-winning SF podcast.

Congratulations to the OC and everyone else involved.
